fact: The average person walks the equivalent of three times around the world in a lifetime.
A 'jiffy' is an actual unit of time: 1/100th of a second.
It is impossible for most people to lick their own elbow.
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
There are more possible iterations of a game of chess than there are atoms in the known universe.
Butterflies taste with their feet.
A group of owls is called a parliament.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from the moon with the naked eye.
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out.
The average cloud weighs about 1.1 million pounds.
The strongest muscle in the body is the masseter (jaw muscle).
It takes 17 muscles to smile and 43 to frown.
A snail can sleep for three years.
No word in the English language rhymes with orange, silver, or purple.
The electric chair was invented by a dentist.
Hawaii is the only US state that grows coffee.
The inventor of the Pringles can is buried in one.
Strawberries are the only fruit with seeds on the outside.
The Earth is not perfectly round; it's an oblate spheroid.
A bolt of lightning is five times hotter than the surface of the sun.
Humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas.
Ketchup was once sold as medicine.
The Hawaiian alphabet has only 12 letters.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
Polar bears have black skin under their white fur.
The moon is slowly moving away from Earth.

Honey never spoils.

Male seahorses carry the babies.

An adult bear can run as fast as a horse.
Tigers have striped skin, not just striped fur.

Frogs drink water through their skin.
Rats laugh when they are tickled.

Hippos are born underwater.

A woodpecker can peck 20 times per second.
